info.name: Exora Backend - Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive Postman collection for all Exora backend endpoints. Includes authentication, users, trips, blocks, activities, experiences, connections, feed, payments, admin, audio analysis, and more.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Jane Smith",
  "email": "jane.smith@example.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "age": 25,
  "location": "San Francisco, USA",
  "bio": "Love traveling and exploring new places",
  "personalityType": "planner",
  "travelPreferences": ["beach", "mountains"],
  "interests": ["Photography", "Hiking", "Food"],
  "travel_type": "solo_traveler"
}

{
  "name": "Europe Adventure 2024",
  "location": "Paris, France",
  "startDate": "2024-06-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2024-06-15T00:00:00.000Z",
  "budget": 3000,
  "description": "A 2-week journey through Europe",
  "isPublic": true
}

{
  "title": "Visit Eiffel Tower",
  "destination": "Eiffel Tower, Paris",
  "type": "Activity",
  "time": "10:00",
  "date": "2024-06-05",
  "radius": 5,
  "details": {
    "title": "Eiffel Tower Tour",
    "description": "Iconic landmark in Paris",
    "duration": "2 hours",
    "cost": 25
  },
  "membersInvolved": ["{{userId}}"]
}

{
  "userId": "{{userId}}",
  "title": "Amazing Europe Trip",
  "description": "A 2-week journey through Europe",
  "totalBudget": 3000,
  "isPublic": true,
  "departureDate": "2024-06-01",
  "arrivalDate": "2024-06-15",
  "destination": "Europe",
  "tags": ["Europe", "Adventure", "Culture"]
}
